name: Grumpys Circle Blast
description:
The Ultimate Arcade Shooter Experience!

Join Grumpy as he blasts his way through hordes of inky black circles in this fast-paced, action-packed arcade shooter. Grumpys Circle Blast is a game that was developed for the 202th Trijam in just 3 hours. My goal was to showcase a polished spawning system that gradually increases in difficulty.

In this game, players take control of Grumpy, a grumpy character who must defend against waves of circles. The controls are simple and intuitive, making it easy for players of all skill levels to jump in and start playing. The gameplay is fast and action-packed, with a focus on highscores and quick reflexes.

Everything, including the sounds, was created by me, however, a small portion of the graphics were reused from previous projects.
